bg: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 1 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
contrast: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 1 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
black: oklch(from var(--color-gray-base) calc(l + 1 * (0 - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
white: oklch(from var(--color-gray-base) calc(l + 1 * (1 - 0 - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
primary-bg: oklch(from var(--color-primary-base) calc(l + 0.2 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.25) h)
secondary-bg: oklch(from var(--color-secondary-base) calc(l + 0.2 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.25) h)
warning-bg: oklch(from var(--color-warning-base) calc(l + 0.2 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.25) h)
positive-bg: oklch(from var(--color-positive-base) calc(l + 0.2 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.25) h)
negative-bg: oklch(from var(--color-negative-base) calc(l + 0.2 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.25) h)
muted-bg: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.2 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.25) h)
muted-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 1 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
accent-bg: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.8 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 3)  h)
accent-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-primary-base) calc(l + 0.6 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 2) h)
card-bg: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.2 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.25) h)
card-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.8 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 3)  h)
popover-bg: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.6 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 2) h)
popover-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.8 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 3)  h)
primary-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-primary-base) calc(l + 1 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
secondary-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-secondary-base) calc(l + 1 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
positive-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-positive-base) calc(l + 1 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
negative-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-negative-base) calc(l + 1 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
warning-contrast: oklch(from var(--color-warning-base) calc(l + 1 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 4.5) h)
dimmed: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.4 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 1.5) h)
border: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.8 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 3) h)
input: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.6 * (1 - var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 2) h)
ring: oklch(from var(--color-neutral-base) calc(l + 0.8 * (var(--color-inverted) - l)) calc(c / 3)  h)
